mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id AS scheduleId, schedule_date AS scheduleDate, schedule_type AS scheduleType, content AS content, target_grade AS targetGrade FROM tbl_academic_schedule WHERE YEAR(schedule_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(schedule_date) = #{month} AND is_deleted = false ORDER BY schedule_date ASC

SELECT schedule_id AS scheduleId, schedule_date AS scheduleDate, schedule_type AS scheduleType, content AS content, target_grade AS targetGrade FROM tbl_academic_schedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND is_deleted = false ORDER BY schedule_date ASC
